description.en:
"ADAMANT is a true Blockchain messenger, independent from governments, corporations and even developers. It is possible due to a decentralized network infrastructure, fully open source and run by users.
ADM is a utility-token supporting decentralized ADAMANT Messenger infrastructure.
Blockchain offers superior security and privacy, not available for typical P2P and centralized messengers. Also, Blockchain provides new possibilities. Users can store and transfer cryptos In-Chat with full control of private keys, use ADAMANT as 2FA and more.
In ADAMANT, nobody can control, block, deactivate, restrict or censor accounts. Users take full responsibility for content, messages, media, and goals and intentions of using the Messenger.
ADAMANT utilize Fair Delegated Proof-of-Stake consensus, developed in mid 2018. 
First development steps were made by ADAMANT TECH LABS LP, registered in Ireland. As ADAMANT is decentralized and open source, it is supported and run by community.
"

status_updates.description: We stop to update this page. For news checkout Twitter https://twitter.com/adamant_im and Medium https://medium.com/adamant-im.

You can store Bitcoin and send in chats in ADAMANT Messenger for iOS v2.8.0.
- Bitcoin wallet & In-chat transfers
- Fixed ETH & ERC20 transactions
- Fixed bugs for MacBook M1
- Other improvements and bug fixes
Download Messenger for iOS and write a review ðŸš€

The ADAMANT Bet Bot is an anonymous and Blockchain-proved betting software, which processes different types of bets, and automatically pays rewards. Classic set up is betting on a cryptocurrency price, like Bitcoin.
https://medium.com/adamant-im/accepting-bets-on-blockchain-and-paying-rewards-in-lsk-eth-and-adm-8dd6abb45e2d

We've updated Market-making bot for cryptocurrency projects: make trade volume, maintain spread and liquidity, set price range, and build live-like dynamic order book.
https://medium.com/adamant-im/update-of-market-making-bot-for-cryptocurrency-projects-2895a7472b9f
Developer, use the ADAMANT JavaScript API library to interact with the ADAMANT blockchain, updated to v1.6.0: https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant-api-jsclient/releases/tag/v1.6.0
ADAMANT Messenger for iOS v2.7.0 update features Dark theme, choosing a notification sound, chat pre-loading and showing ERC20 network for tokens.

We've updated ADAMANT Node software. New version 0.7.0 doesn't break consensus, so it's not necessary to update your node. Changes:
- Update dependencies
- Move legacy code to /legacy dir
- Remove legacy docs
